item.title: R to @conduitxyz: Powerloom gives builders a new way to feed onchain data into their apps, with a decentralized network of snapshotters and validators ensuring all information delivered is accurate.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: Powerloom gives builders a new way to feed onchain data into their apps, with a decentralized network of snapshotters and validators ensuring all information delivered is accurate.

item.title:
Just launched: @Powerloom Mainnet, the L2 that gives builders the onchain data they need.
Powerloom is built on @Optimism OP Stack, settles on Ethereum, and uses @eigen_da for data availability, plus @superbridgeapp for native bridge UI.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Just launched: @Powerloom Mainnet, the L2 that gives builders the onchain data they need.

Powerloom is built on @Optimism OP Stack, settles on Ethereum, and uses @eigen_da for data availability, plus @superbridgeapp for native bridge UI.

nitter.freedit.eu/Powerloom/status/1877485168241311883#m

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: The premise behind AI agents is simple: Give an AI control of a crypto wallet and instructions of what to do onchain. The agent takes it from there.
AI agents are already trading, launching memecoins, and even posting on Crypto Twitter
Some examples from the Conduit ecosystem:
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
The premise behind AI agents is simple: Give an AI control of a crypto wallet and instructions of what to do onchain. The agent takes it from there.

AI agents are already trading, launching memecoins, and even posting on Crypto Twitter

Some examples from the Conduit ecosystem:

item.title:
Onchain AI agents are dominating the crypto conversation in 2025, and Conduit customers like @PhalaNetwork, @modenetwork, @derivexyz, @stride_zone, and @xgurunetwork are leading the way.
